name: Tower Bloxx Deluxe 3D
summary:
Compete against your friends on Facebook, iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. Tower Bloxx is an award-winning and highly addictive game with over 4 million players on iOS and other gaming platforms.
-----------------------------------------
NEW SOCIAL UPDATE
Compete with friends on Facebook, iPhone and iPod touch to see who dominates in tower building. Also, beat the score of Trip Hawkins, to unlock an achievement and get a virtual high-five. Check out other fun surprises and features in this update and start playing with friends now!
GAME REVIEW
IGN gives 8.5/10 and says "the game perfectly blends action -based puzzling with strategy to make a very compelling play that gamers of all stripes will love."
-----------------------------------------
Reach the skies in a wacky skyscraper construction game that tests your reflexes and puzzle skills! Play against your friends, connect to Facebook, post scores, and more! Immerse yourself in a full 3D experience and create a thriving metropolis in City Building Mode with three distinctive districts, 70 levels, and four types of towers. Compete with others in Party Multiplayer Mode or play endlessly in the Quick Game Mode! Build the entire city block now!
